review: I had been to hospital and met the doctor. Consultation was good with the doctor.  I have already recommended doctor to my family or friends. Even my brother had visited him. Medicine was suggested by the doctor. X-ray was done. My health is good now. He asked to do exercise for leg. My leg was broken in the month of Feb-march then I got treated by him. Recently I had some pain so met him again. Hospitality was good.

My sister had visited the hospital and it was health problem. Treatment is going on as its 18 months course. ****** *** ***** Two doctors have treated my sister. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Medicine was told to continue by doctor. MRI was done. Doctor told to visit after 15 days. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was for 1 hour. My sister had tuberculosis. Protein food was suggested to have.

My daughter had health issue so went to hospital. ****** *** ***** I am extremely happy having consultation with doctor Dr. P.Madhu. He is very nice and diagnosed problem correctly. I would like to recommend this doctor to other people if anyone asks. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  Physical exercise was suggested. Blood test and MRI were done. There was more waiting time in the hospital, we waited for 45 minutes in hospital even after taking an appointment. Doctor was friendly and I respect from the bottom of my heart, his behavior was good and the way consultation happened. Hospitality was good. My daughter was into skating and due to vitamin D deficiency, she had limping problem - unable to walk properly and now she is improving.
